Primary Contact: Katrina Lehenbauer, Program Coordinator, Food for Thought
Service Details: - Aims to eliminate hunger in children, one child at a time in the Central Okanagan by providing free breakfast to over 1500 school-aged children a day in 30 schools located in Kelowna, Lake Country and West Kelowna- Breakfast typically consists of fruit, dairy (milk, cheese, yogurt), and a grain (toast, bagel, muffin, oatmeal)- Breakfast is provided by securing reclaimed food from local coffee shops, purchasing foods from dollars received from grants, fundraising, sponsorships, and donations, and food donations from the Central Okanagan Food Bank, Lake Country Food Bank, and Gospel Mission
